com.ericdaugherty.lib.error
Class CascadingException

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--com.ericdaugherty.lib.error.CascadingException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BusinessException, SystemException
public class CascadingException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements java.io.Serializable

Provides the ability to 'cascade' exceptions. This exception can be created and passes another exception. When this exception is displayed, the information from this exception is displayed, along with the info from the exception passed to this class

Author:
Eric Daugherty
See Also:
Serialized Form
